input:
(declare-sort Expr)
(declare-sort Var)
(declare-datatypes ((Stmt 0)) 
  (((Assignment (lval Var) (rval Expr)) 
    (If (cond Expr) (th Stmt) (el Stmt)) 
    (Seq (stmts (Seq Stmt))))))

(declare-const s Stmt)
(declare-const t Stmt)

(assert ((_ is Seq) t))
(assert ((_ is Seq) s))
(assert (= s (seq.nth (stmts t) 2)))
(assert (>= (seq.len (stmts s)) 5))
(check-sat)
(get-model)
(assert (= s (Seq (seq.unit s))))
(check-sat)
